alfredsnippet.snippet:
The Nature of the Physical World, Sir A. Eddington (1928), p.281

"In so far as supernaturalism is associated with the denial of strict causality I can only answer that that is what the modern scientific development of the quantum theory brings us to."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Eddington Compares Quantum Theory to Supernaturalism
